categories.name: Student Innovation
categories.description: Innovation projects by students for students

problemStatements.title: AI-powered Traffic Management System
problemStatements.description: Develop an AI-powered traffic management system that can dynamically adjust traffic signals based on real-time traffic conditions, reduce congestion, and improve overall traffic flow in urban areas.
problemStatements.organization: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: Reduction in traffic congestion by 30-40% and improvement in fuel efficiency

problemStatements.title: Blockchain-based Supply Chain Transparency
problemStatements.description: Create a blockchain-based solution for ensuring transparency and traceability in supply chains, particularly for agricultural products and pharmaceuticals.
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: 100% traceability of products from origin to consumer

problemStatements.title: Smart Healthcare Monitoring Device
problemStatements.description: Design a wearable device that continuously monitors vital signs and alerts healthcare providers in case of emergencies, especially for elderly patients living alone.
problemStatements.organization: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: 24/7 health monitoring with 95% accuracy in emergency detection

problemStatements.title: Digital Library Management System
problemStatements.description: Develop a comprehensive digital library management system that allows students to access, borrow, and return books digitally while maintaining inventory and user management.
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: Paperless library system with 50% reduction in administrative work

problemStatements.title: Smart Parking System
problemStatements.description: Create an automated parking system that guides drivers to available parking spots using sensors and mobile applications, reducing time spent searching for parking.
problemStatements.organization: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: 60% reduction in parking search time and better space utilization

problemStatements.title: Waste Management Optimization
problemStatements.description: Develop a solution to optimize waste collection routes and schedules using AI and IoT sensors to monitor fill levels of waste bins across the city.
problemStatements.organization: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: 30% reduction in waste collection costs and improved cleanliness

problemStatements.title: AI-powered Crop Disease Detection
problemStatements.description: Build an AI-powered mobile application that can identify crop diseases through image recognition and provide treatment recommendations to farmers.
problemStatements.organization: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: 85% accuracy in disease detection and 20% increase in crop yield

problemStatements.title: Smart Water Quality Monitoring
problemStatements.description: Design an IoT-based water quality monitoring system that continuously checks water parameters and alerts authorities about contamination in real-time.
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: Real-time water quality monitoring with 99% uptime

problemStatements.title: Student Performance Analytics Platform
problemStatements.description: Create a comprehensive platform that analyzes student performance data to provide personalized learning recommendations and identify students at risk of dropping out.
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: Personalized learning paths for students and 25% improvement in academic outcomes

problemStatements.title: Smart Energy Management System
problemStatements.description: Develop an automated energy management system for smart homes that optimizes energy consumption based on usage patterns and renewable energy availability.
problemStatements.organization: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: 30% reduction in energy consumption and optimal use of renewable energy

problemStatements.title: Disaster Early Warning System
problemStatements.description: Build an early warning system for natural disasters using satellite data, weather sensors, and AI to predict and alert communities about potential disasters.
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: Early warning 6-12 hours before disaster onset with 90% accuracy

problemStatements.title: Digital Identity Verification System
problemStatements.description: Create a secure digital identity verification system using biometrics and blockchain technology for various government services and applications.
problemStatements.organization: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: Secure and efficient identity verification with 99.9% accuracy

problemStatements.title: Smart Agriculture Drone System
problemStatements.description: Design an autonomous drone system for precision agriculture that can monitor crop health, spray pesticides, and collect field data automatically.
problemStatements.organization: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: Automated farming operations with 40% reduction in pesticide usage

problemStatements.title: Virtual Classroom Platform
problemStatements.description: Develop an interactive virtual classroom platform with features like real-time collaboration, assessment tools, and accessibility features for students with disabilities.
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: Inclusive online learning platform with 95% student engagement

problemStatements.title: Smart Home Security System
problemStatements.description: Create an intelligent home security system that uses computer vision and AI to detect intruders, recognize family members, and provide smart alerts.
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: Comprehensive home security with 95% accurate threat detection

problemStatements.title: Mental Health Support Chatbot
problemStatements.description: Develop an AI-powered chatbot that provides mental health support, mood tracking, and connects users with professional help when needed.
problemStatements.organization: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
problemStatements.expectedOutcome: 24/7 mental health support with professional intervention capability
